Whenever an opponent loses life, that player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost less than or equal to the life that player lost. That player discards that card.
Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie Orc creature token.
notes: fluffy: +that player (Well of Lost Dreams), -amount of (Gonti's Machinations), swapped less than/equal to
